title: [K-12] Advanced Virtual Chemistry Laboratory: Inquiry-based Learning Design

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of general chemistry and basic laboratory skills
context.additional_context: Virtual laboratory operations using personal devices (BYOD) for adult learners, strengthening chemical experiment design and analysis skills through project-based assessment

learning_goals: Learners can independently design experimental procedures using 3D simulation tools on virtual chemistry laboratory platforms.
Students can formulate and validate hypotheses to solve chemical problems by applying inquiry-based learning methodologies.
Students can complete laboratory reports by exchanging peer evaluations and feedback using online collaboration tools.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
